masthead.headline: Welcome to our lab
masthead.introduction: We are digital artisans, passionate software craftsmen fueled by caffeine. Implementing software is one thing, but creating the appropriate solution that best suit your needs is another.

features.title: Craftmanship
features.description: At our lab, we pride ourselves with excellence mindset. We strive to know the in's-and-out's of whatever technology we're using, resulting to quality output. We adhere to the Software craftsmanship manifesto as our credo.

features.title: Innovative
features.description: Innovation is in our blood. When we're not working, we focus heavily on R&D, fiddling with new software and hardware technologies. This habit provides us the ability to easily identify solutions and give you better options for your needs.

features.title: User-centered
features.description: Ultimately, your product ends up on your users - their experience on the product will be their impression on you and your business. Our work finds the right balance between what your user needs, and what we both think they need.

clients.statement: Working with Devlabs has been nothing but a pleasure. They've really guided us in exploring the right solution appropriate in our current situation.
clients.author: PS Duena IT Solutions

clients.statement: We have a major problem regarding filing records. OSysHub was the solution that we never knew we needed until it's here.
clients.author: OLMHRP

services.title: Software Development
services.description: We build web, desktop and mobile applications. Well-tested, well-documented and only built with industry best practices. We'll help you maintain it but you're not stuck with us either, our clean code makes that possible.

services.title: Database Design and Optimization
services.description: Service availability relies on data availability so as data availability relies on the backend architecture of an application. So we provide an engineered DB design that is normalized and optimized.

services.title: Computer Networking
services.description: The laboratory is here to deliver a network design that best suits your workplace. Security, reliability, and availabilty are on top of our priority in providing you a converged network.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Form complementing function. We design interface that highlights your niche and includes strategic content architecture. It is also our duty to comply with the industry standards while modernizing your interface and experience.

services.title: Trainings & Tutorials
services.description: Learning is our passion and we love to share it with you. This will equip you with the essential knowledge in facing the high IT demand of the industry.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: Having problems or uncertainties? Let's see what we can do. No really, we're genuinely here to help. We don't care whether you'll avail our services or not. We'll have a minute to hear you out. Chat with us. We'll help your untangle the whole mess.
